channel.title: tool on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration
channel.description: Recent content in tool on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration

item.title: Eclipse Lyo
item.description: The Eclipse Lyo project provides an SDK to help Java developers adopt OSLC specifications and build OSLC-compliant tools.

item.title: OSLC4JS
item.description: OSLC4JS is a set of related open source projects that support the creation and integration of OSLC-based client and server applications that leverage JavaScript and Node.js capabilities.

item.title: OSLC4Net
item.description: A toolkit for developing OSLC consumers and providers for .NET environments
